name.title: Full Name
name.description: The person's full name that may uniquely identify the person

primary_url.title: Definitive URL
primary_url.description: A URL that uniquely and decisively identifies the person (e.g., a personal home page, Twitter profile, etc.)

description.title: Personal Description
description.description: A brief description about the person

noo_uid.title: Noo UID
noo_uid.description: Noo's unique identifier for the person

noo_created.title: Noo Created
noo_created.description: The date and time (a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477) when Noo cataloged this person

noo_data.title: Additional Data
noo_data.description: An object to store a JSON payload containing any additional data about the person

noo_uid.title: Linkee's Noo UID
noo_uid.description: Noo's unique identifier for the linked person

link_type.title: Link Type
link_type.description: Type of link to this person (e.g., "follows")
